p: The effect of soilless media and fertigation regime on mesembrenone area % in the root of S. tortuosum was statistically significant at the value of p ≤ 0.001. At p ≤ 0.001, the highest concentrations of mesembrenone area % were recorded in the SC medium under fertigation regime 5 (FR5) and SP medium under fertigation regime 2 (FR2) while the least value (17.56%) was observed in SP medium under fertigation regime 2 (FR2).
